title: Start a Reselling Business
description: Go from zero to your first 10 sales — sourcing, listing, shipping, and bookkeeping covered.

steps.title: Connect your first marketplace
steps.description: Link eBay, Mercari, or Facebook so Orben can track your listings and sales.

steps.title: Import your existing inventory
steps.description: Pull in your active listings from connected platforms — no re-entry needed.

steps.title: Add your first inventory item
steps.description: Photograph, measure, and add your first item to Orben's inventory with purchase price set.

steps.title: Crosslist to 2+ marketplaces
steps.description: Push that item to multiple platforms at once and get it in front of more buyers.

steps.title: Log your first sale
steps.description: When it sells, record the sale in Orben and see your first profit calculation.

steps.title: Review your profit breakdown
steps.description: Open Analytics and understand what you actually made after fees and costs.
